info.name: Fossil Fight
info.attribution:
Game layout, library image, and scripting by Robin Harn, released to the Public Domain under CC0.

The following graphics are from https://game-icons.net and are used under CC BY 3.0:
* Trilobite https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/trilobite.html
* Ammonite Fossil https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/ammonite-fossil.html
* T-Rex Skull https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/t-rex-skull.html
* Cut Diamond https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/cut-diamond.html
* Egg Eye https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/egg-eye.html
* Wooden Crate https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/wooden-crate.html

The following graphics are from http://www.freepik.com and are used under the Freepik license:
* Sea Beach Wasteland https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/sea-beach-wasteland-with-dry-cracked-soil_12569304.htm
info.description: Excavate the most lucrative dig sites and fight for fossils with opposing archeologists!
info.similarAwards: 2009 Boardgames Australia Awards Best International Game Nominee

clickRoutine.header: Add this many points to your score:

clickRoutine.note: Sanity check / typo avoidance 1 of 2: only add value if it is an integer

thenRoutine.note: Sanity check / typo avoidance 2 of 2: only add value if it is a three-digit number

fields.text: You're about to reset the game. Are you sure?

loopRoutine.note: Deal each player 1 tile from their deck

clickRoutine.header: Add this many points to your score:

clickRoutine.note: Sanity check / typo avoidance 1 of 2: only add value if it is an integer

thenRoutine.note: Sanity check / typo avoidance 2 of 2: only add value if it is a three-digit number
